member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_OIF
member.summary: TheMIB_IPMCAST_OIF structure stores the information required to send an outgoing IP multicast packet.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_OIF.dwOutIfIndex
member.summary: The index of the interface on which to send the outgoing IP multicast packet.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_OIF.dwNextHopAddr
member.summary: The destination address for the outgoing IPv4 multicast packet.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_OIF.pvReserved
member.summary: Reserved. This member should be NULL.

member.name: MIB_IPMCAST_OIF.dwReserved
member.summary: Reserved. This member should be zero.
